name: Phaser Demo Project
description:
This game is infinitely scalable- I have set up the leveling system and enemies to go on to a very large degree. You whack the enemies for coins, keep them away from your princess, and upgrade her health and your sword in the shop. Good luck! 

Use WASD to move and left click to swing your sword. The game is fully scaled to fit endless enemy hordes that procedurally get harder, a levelling system for your attack strength (sword), and dynamically added hearts for health. There's no end to it, but if you happen to get far enough to see a creature as big as a refrigerator- you've probably played enough.

The gravity system is implemented in the coin spawns, as there's not really many other places to put gravity in a top-down game, and your score per each "session" is added cumulatively to your Bank, which can be used in the Shop.

If you have troubles with controls- play it HERE. Itch.io is notoriously buggy with embedded games, so the direct link should give you a better experience.
